entry.title: PART 6 @Schuyler Bailar | Last month I traveled with @August to #Florida to protest #HB1069 - a dangerous bill that passed into law on July 1st. This is another clip of a longer and fascinating conversation I had with a pastor after I finally shared that
entry.content: PART 6 @Schuyler Bailar | Last month I traveled with @August to #Florida to protest #HB1069 - a dangerous bill that passed into law on July 1st. This is another clip of a longer and fascinating conversation I had with a pastor after I finally shared that I am also trans. #gender #transgender #lgbtq #transrights #genderaffirmingcare

entry.title: Part 7 @Schuyler Bailar | The last of this series about my conversation with a pastor about gender! Overall my interaction with him was good; we do not agree on everything but I deeply appreciated how we could have a calm conversation and that he was ope
entry.content: Part 7 @Schuyler Bailar | The last of this series about my conversation with a pastor about gender! Overall my interaction with him was good; we do not agree on everything but I deeply appreciated how we could have a calm conversation and that he was open to learning. Grateful for @August bringing me along to be in moments like this! #florida #hb1069 #transgender #learning #gender #conversation

entry.title: This is NOT an ad... I just wanted to share how I work! My set up has evolved over the years. Now includes this computer stand, a keyboard, and a mouse to ensure that I am #ergonomic. This has made a huge difference for me regarding chronic neck pain! #wf
entry.content: This is NOT an ad... I just wanted to share how I work! My set up has evolved over the years. Now includes this computer stand, a keyboard, and a mouse to ensure that I am #ergonomic. This has made a huge difference for me regarding chronic neck pain! #wfh #neckpain #transgender #advocate #workremote

entry.title: Replying to @Alex Anti-trans rhetoric is powerful and needs to be disputed. Attend my Allyship Bootcamp to learn more about mythbusting transphobia! Sign up at pinkmantaray.com/workshops. #transgender #genderaffirmingsurgery #transition #gender
entry.content: Replying to @Alex Anti-trans rhetoric is powerful and needs to be disputed. Attend my Allyship Bootcamp to learn more about mythbusting transphobia! Sign up at pinkmantaray.com/workshops. #transgender #genderaffirmingsurgery #transition #gender

entry.title: @Cal ran 2,800 miles across the country, ending in Florida - one if the epicenters of anti-trans legislation. We celebrated with a panel and a 5k trot. What an incredibly SPECIAL event. Stay tuned for more. #transgender ##transathlete##running##advocacy##
entry.content: @Cal ran 2,800 miles across the country, ending in Florida - one if the epicenters of anti-trans legislation. We celebrated with a panel and a 5k trot. What an incredibly SPECIAL event. Stay tuned for more. #transgender ##transathlete##running##advocacy##traveler##workremote

entry.title: This was so special... I've never officially raced with another trans person, much less a PRO trans athlete. So proud of @Cal completing his trans continental run... and @Cal Calamia, thanks for running slow so I could actually keep up 😂💕🏳️‍⚧️ #transathle
entry.content: This was so special... I've never officially raced with another trans person, much less a PRO trans athlete. So proud of @Cal completing his trans continental run... and @Cal Calamia, thanks for running slow so I could actually keep up 😂💕🏳️‍⚧️ #transathlete #transgender #running #trotfortranslives #transathletesbelonginsports
